text: Pleurophascum is a genus of haplolepideous mosses (Dicranidae) in the monotypic family Pleurophascaceae in the order Pottiales. ==Species== Three species are recognised: *Pleurophascum grandiglobum *Pleurophascum occidentale *Pleurophascum ovalifolium ==References== Category:Moss genera Category:Pottiales
title: Pleurophascum
